#summary List of useful chat commands

= Chat commands =


/nick - change nickname

/profile - change your profile msg

/sync - gets the url to sync buddylist with

/dice - random number

/time - your time

/mypage - send a page from your to the other

/page - retrieve a page from the other

/status - change your current status

/addbuddy - quickly adds a new buddy based on his/her address

/delbuddy - quickly removes a buddy based on his/her address

/log - save a log from the chatwindow in log/

/me - make an action

/quit - closes jtorchat

/help - prints out common instructions.
